name: unsent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unsent letter, email, etc. has not been sent: He drafted the letter, but it remained unsent. The software also monitored unsent emails.
More examplesFewer examplesI knew you would wonder what had been in this unsent letter.In an unsent letter later that year, he reflected on these events.On his return, he penned an (unsent) letter.The total number of unsent ballots was said to be in the thousands.They carried out research into credit card disputes, including complaints about unsent goods.This meant that all unsent data would be lost.
